title: Fracmetrica Black .otf
content:
the free-font **»Fracmetrica Black«** is a modern and geometric blackletter with several opentype-features like ligatures, case-sensitives, text figures.  
It's kind of condensed and has a high contrast. The typeface's construction is based on an isometric 60°-grid.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414142349im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jakob_p2_fracmetrica_intro_3878.jpg)

Created by Jakob Runge 2009 during the [Workshop »fancy\_fonts\_&\_porno\_pattern« at the university of applied sciences würzburg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414142349/http:/gestaltung.fh-wuerzburg.de/blogs/werk_statt_villa/?cat=6)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414142349im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jakob_fracmetrica2_style_1_4071.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414142349im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jakob_fracmetrica2_zeichen_5447.jpg)

the open-type version of »Fracmetrica Black« is for free creative-commons download.  
 [about the finished and digitalised font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414142349/http:/gestaltung.fh-wuerzburg.de/blogs/werk_statt_villa/?p=462)
